    • getPendingEnquiries

      public List<String> getPendingEnquiries(String userID)
      get list of unresolved enquiries. If user is camp committee member or staff in charge of camp, camp pending enquires to be replied will be returned If user is participant or non-member of camp, camp pending enquiries created by them will be returned
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      Returns:
      list of unresolved enquiries sorted alphabetically by enquiry creator name
      See Also:
      • EnquiryListController.getPendingEnquiries(String)

    • getResolvedEnquiries

      public List<String> getResolvedEnquiries(String userID)
      get list of resolved enquiries. If user is camp committee member or staff in charge of camp, camp resolved enquires will be returned If user is participant or non-member of camp, camp resolved enquiries created by them will be returned
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      Returns:
      list of resolved enquiries sorted alphabetically by enquiry creator name
      See Also:
      • EnquiryListController.getResolvedEnquiries(String)

    • getAllEnquiries

      public List<String> getAllEnquiries(String userID)
      get list of resolved and unresolved enquiries.

      If user is camp committee member or staff in charge of camp, camp resolved and unresolved enquires will be returned

      If user is participant or non-member of camp, camp resolved and unresolved enquiries created by them will be returned

      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      Returns:
      list of resolved enquiries sorted alphabetically by enquiry creator name
      See Also:
      • EnquiryListController.getAllEnquiries(String)
